pull.title: Define BIP-119 CheckDefaultCheckTemplateVerifyHash
pull.body: Adds pseudocode definition of `CheckDefaultCheckTemplateVerifyHash()` to BIP-119 specification in the obvious way. Even though it is trivial, it should be included to dissolve any doubts.

committer Orfeas Litos <orfeas.litos@hotmail.com> 1635888965 +0100

Define BIP-119 CheckDefaultCheckTemplateVerifyHash

events.body: ack -- i'm not sure that it compile though because the type of stack.back() is vector<unsigned char> and the checker takes a hash but maybe theres a constructor that does that coercion? Otherwise should use std::equal_range or something...
I suspect that a `uint256()` around the `stack.back()` that is passed to `CheckDefaultCheckTemplateVerifyHash` would do the trick in a clean way.

events.body:
seems reasonable to me now -- note that this differs from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21702/files#diff-a0337ffd7259e8c7c9a7786d6dbd420c80abfa1afdb34ebae3261109d9ae3c19R1910-R1918, the actual implementation.

small preference to keep the interface of the checker the same.
